commitResults.messageTitle: Updated Duke with Level-1: Greet, Echo, Exit
Updated Level-1 with improvements to it!
Updated Level-1 with its tag
Updated Duke with Level-2: Add, List
Updated Duke with Level-3: Mark as Done
Updated Duke with Level-4: ToDos, Events, Deadlines and added classes Event, ToDos, Task and Deadline
Updated input.txt and EXPECTED.TXT with the required Automated Text UI Testing with testcase from Level-4 example!
Updated Duke with Level-6: Delete, not yet done with Level-5: Handle Errors!
Updated Duke with Level-5: Handle Errors and added DukeException.java for exceptions unique to Duke
Updated functions "mark", "unmark" and "delete" to handle situations where the task the user is trying to select is OUT OF RANGE!
Updated Duke.java (amended some texts and shorten some code) and Task.java (amended some texts)

Updated Testcases to use for testing in EXPECTED.TXT and input.txt Updated Duke.java and DukeException.java (shortened Duke.java code with less repetition of calling try catch statement for the same thing)
Fixed Duke.java switch case's text indentation.
Updated imports in Duke.java and DukeException.java such that they are listed explicitly.

Created a new folder "data" to contain "storage.txt". Storage.txt is used to store all tasks created by the user. This can normally be viewed via the command "list". Updated Duke.java and DukeException.java to check if the folder "data" exists and if "storage.txt" exists within data.
Fix DukeException.java's method definitions form by following the Java coding standards
Fix Duke.java's boolean variable namings and minor issues with regards to Java coding standards
Fix some minor bugs with Level-7: Save, left with writing to file and overriding to the file
Update the following classes with Level-7 requirements: Deadline.java, Duke.java, Event.java, Task.java, ToDos.java Update storage.txt
commitResults.messageBody:
Add functions for Level-7: Writing to File, Retrieving from File, Overwriting of file

Fix some minor bugs and errors pertaining to Java Coding Standards

commitResults.messageTitle: Update the following classes with Date and Time as per Level-8 requirements but without the ability to print deadlines/events occurring on a specific date: Deadline.java, Duke.java, Event.java
Update tasks stored in storage.txt
Fix some minor issues with Duke.java
Create packages: classes and exceptions to store the respective java files
commitResults.messageBody:
Move Deadline.java, Duke.java, Event.java, Task.java, ToDos.java to package classes
Move DukeException.java to package exceptions

Add FolderNotFoundException.java, IncorrectNoOfArgumentException.java, InvalidCommandException.java to package exceptions

commitResults.messageTitle: Add DeadlineTest.java, EventTest.java, ToDosTest.java to test folder as Junit tests!
Fix Duke.java and DukeException.java to handle and resolve when one cannot locate a specific directory / file
Update JAR file with the new working copy after fixing issues with missing folder and file
Add classes: Parser.java, Storage.java, TaskList.java, Ui.java, DukeTest.java to incorporate OOP onto Duke.java
commitResults.messageBody:
Edit DukeException.java to fix some inputs to methods validate(). TAKE NOTE of the arguments required by the NEW validate().

*Additional comments: storage.txt is no longer being revision controlled and validate() takes in DIFFERENT arguments now!

commitResults.messageTitle: Add JavaDoc to the following java files: Storage.java, Task.java, Deadline.java, Duke.java, Event.java, Parser.java, TaskList.java, ToDos.java, Ui.java, DukeException.java, FolderNotFoundException.java, IncorrectNoOfArgumentException.java, InvalidCommandException.java
commitResults.messageBody: *Notes: JavaDoc has yet to be added into the files under the test directory.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix some minor JavaDoc issues with InvalidCommandException.java
Amend the following classes code as per the Java Coding Standard: Duke.java, Event.java, Parser.java, Storage.java, Task.java, TaskList.java, DukeException.java
Add a new function for Duke: find(String str).
commitResults.messageBody: *Note: This function is capable of finding all tasks that has the string in its task information and print them out in an ascending order list.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix a grammar error in TaskList
Fix find() in TaskList.java to be able to look for individual words in a given substring instead of a whole string to improve search results.
commitResults.messageBody: *Note: Took inspiration from fellow GitHub user ("huixuant") during PR and incorporated this to improve the searching capabilities of find() in TaskList.java.

commitResults.messageTitle: Change the directory name of directory "classes" to "duke" to give a better name for the following classes: Deadline.java, Duke.java, Event.java, Parser.java, Storage.java, Task.java, TaskList.java, ToDos.java, Ui.java
Fix and updated the test files so that they can be used.
Add new test file "storageTest(delete before each test).txt" to be ignored in .gitignore
Change file name "ToDosTest.java" and "ToDos.java" to "ToDoTest.java" and "ToDo.java" respectively and updated TaskList.java code of ToDo
Change file "ToDosTest.java" to "ToDoTest.java"
Fix the issues with regards to A-CheckStyle guidelines after adding in the Checkstyle files into Duke.
Amend Duke.java and Ui.java to encapsulate the details of printing DateTimeFormat error to the user.
Edit JavaDocs info for printInvalidDateTime().
Add classes: Command, AddCommand, DeleteCommand, FindCommand, ListCommand, MarkCommand, UnmarkCommand to remove the operations from taskList.
Edit TaskList.java and removed a few redundant statements that are not used.
Fix TaskList.java by removing one unnecessary code line.
Create GUI for Duke.
commitResults.messageBody:
Update following files to incorporate JavaFX: build.gradle, Duke.java, Parser.java, Ui.java, AddCommand.java, Command.java, DeleteCommand.java, FindCommand.java, ListCommand.java, MarkCommand.java, UnmarkCommand.java.

Add following classes related to JavaFX: DialogBox.java, Launcher.java, Main.java, MainWindow.java, ByeCommand.java.
Add following .fxml classes for JavaFX: DialogBox.fxml, MainWindow.fxml.
Add following images for JavaFX: Shiro.jpg, CrayonShinChan.png
